post.description: Remove an operation from the mempool if present, reverting its effect if it was applied. Add it to the set of banned operations to prevent it from being fetched/processed/injected in the future. Note: If the baker has already received the operation, then it's necessary to restart it to flush the operation from it.

get.description: Get the configuration of the mempool filter.

post.description: Set the configuration of the mempool filter.

parameters.name: branch_delayed
parameters.description: Include branch delayed operations (set by default)

post.description: Request the operations of your peers.
Clear the set of banned operations.
Remove an operation from the set of banned operations (nothing happens if it was not banned).

011-PtHangz2.block_header.alpha.full_hea.title: Shell header
011-PtHangz2.block_header.alpha.full_hea.description: Block header's shell-related content. It contains information such as the block level, its predecessor and timestamp.

011-PtHangz2.contract_id.title: A contract handle
011-PtHangz2.contract_id.description: A contract notation as given to an RPC or inside scripts. Can be a base58 implicit contract hash or a base58 originated contract hash.

011-PtHangz2.entrypoint.title: entrypoint
011-PtHangz2.entrypoint.description: Named entrypoint to a Michelson smart contract

Generic prim (any number of args with or without annot)

Signature.title: A Ed25519, Secp256k1 or P256 signature (Base58Check-encoded)

Signature.Public_key.title: A Ed25519, Secp256k1, or P256 public key (Base58Check-encoded)

Signature.Public_key_hash.title: A Ed25519, Secp256k1, or P256 public key hash (Base58Check-encoded)

bignum.title: Big number
bignum.description: Decimal representation of a big number

error.description: The full list of error is available with the global RPC `GET errors`

fitness.title: Block fitness
fitness.description: The fitness, or score, of a block, that allow the Tezos to decide which chain is the best. A fitness value is a list of byte sequences. They are compared as follows: shortest lists are smaller; lists of the same length are compared according to the lexicographical order.

oneOf.title: Generic prim (any number of args with or without annot)

positive_bignum.title: Positive big number
positive_bignum.description: Decimal representation of a positive big number

timestamp.protocol.description: A timestamp as seen by the protocol: second-level precision, epoch based.

unistring.title: Universal string representation
unistring.description: Either a plain UTF8 string, or a sequence of bytes for strings that contain invalid byte sequences.
